metadata.synopsis: Receptionist at the entrance of the Hospital. She's mostly supposed to be there for flavor and to provide directions to the operating room (down the hallway and under the observation area.) If you piss her off or try to circumvent her to see the doctor, she'll fight you.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to the hospital in the town in SCL. Speak to the nurse at the reception area.S_TWN_Hospital_Reception_Receptionist pos:-204; 31; -6

9.speaker: Sister Sinda
9.text: The doctor is absent today. Come back another time.

36.speaker: Sister Sinda
36.text: The doctor will see you now.
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: The nurse 'looks' you over, assessing your condition.InternalNodeContext: Upon investigation, deduces that you're not that sick.

49.speaker: Sister Sinda
49.text: Down the corridor. Down to theatre you go.

53.speaker: Sister Sinda
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: The nurse 'looks' you over, assessing your condition.InternalNodeContext: Upon investigation, deduces that you're not that sick.

73.speaker: Sister Sinda
73.text: You're not sick, not sick at all. Wait in line.
73.context: CinematicNodeContext: The nurse 'looks' you over, assessing your condition.InternalNodeContext: Upon investigation, deduces that you're not that sick.

86.speaker: Sister Sinda
86.text: No worse, no better, no need to be here.
86.context: CinematicNodeContext: The nurse 'looks' you over, assessing your condition.InternalNodeContext: Upon investigation, deduces that you're not that sick.

88.speaker: Sister Sinda
88.text: Here to see the doctor? Are we poorly? Are we desperately poorly?
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: The nurse 'looks' you over, assessing your condition.InternalNodeContext: Upon investigation, deduces that you're not that sick.

55.speaker: Sister Sinda
55.text: Not so well. But well enough to wait. Join the line, and you will be seen.
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: The nurse 'looks' you over, assessing your condition.InternalNodeContext: Upon investigation, deduces that you're not that sick.

79.speaker: Player
79.text: I'm sick as a dog - dark compulsions addle my mind.
79.context: NodeContext: with a touch of desperation

51.speaker: Sister Sinda
51.text: Hrm, hrm. Let me check, let me check.
51.context: NodeContext: with a touch of desperation

37.speaker: Sister Sinda
37.context: NodeContext: with a touch of desperation

40.speaker: Player
40.text: I'm only truly happy when I'm ending someone's life.
40.context: NodeContext: with a touch of desperation

69.speaker: Sister Sinda
69.text: There is no shame in an end. All things come to be lost. But if you wish to be examined...
69.context: NodeContext: with a touch of desperation

11.speaker: Sister Sinda
11.text: Join the line - you will be seen.
11.context: NodeContext: with a touch of desperation

28.speaker: Player
28.text: My mind is full of holes, and some of them are still being punched.
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nuse checking the DU's head

57.speaker: Sister Sinda
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nuse checking the DU's head

5.speaker: Sister Sinda
5.text: Poor dear. Poor, poor dear. Who did this to you?
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nuse checking the DU's head

60.speaker: Player
60.text: What in the Hells can you see?

21.speaker: Sister Sinda
21.text: I am but a nurse here, the Surgeon... he will be able to examine you in full.

61.speaker: Player
61.text: Everything. I lose control of myself, and kill without command.

92.speaker: Sister Sinda
92.text: A unique disease - one which has never passed through this institution before.

63.speaker: Sister Sinda
63.text: The Surgeon will be most interested in you.

94.speaker: Player
94.text: When I try to sleep I am plagued by distressing sights.

77.speaker: Sister Sinda
77.text: Too many thoughts - a thrice-cursed ailment. The emptiness you yearn for will be yours again.

66.speaker: Player
66.text: Fine fine. I'll get in line.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: I don't have time to wait - I need to see the doctor right now.

14.speaker: Sister Sinda
14.text: Yes yes, but all must wait. The doctor's hands are full.

43.speaker: Sister Sinda
43.text: Join the line - you will be seen.
43.context: NodeContext: with a touch of desperation

19.speaker: Player
19.text: I'm not a patient - I've been hired as a new healer.

56.speaker: Player
56.text: I am no patient - I've been hired as a spiritual advisor.

93.speaker: Player
93.text: I am no patient - I've just been hired as an expert in maladaptive necromantic malaise.

81.speaker: Player
81.text: I'm not a patient - I'm the doctor's new assistant.

84.text: Such cruelty, such callousness. And in our time of need. Away.

24.speaker: Sister Sinda
24.text: Such cruelty, such callousness. And in our time of need. Away.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: Mimic the symptoms of Assassin's Blood, a well-known poison.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: Feign the symptoms of a disease most terrible.

59.speaker: Sister Sinda
59.text: Poor creature - so sad, so sick.

41.speaker: Sister Sinda
41.text: Poor creature - so sad, so sick.

31.speaker: Sister Sinda
31.text: The doctor will see you. The doctor will soothe.

10.speaker: Sister Sinda
10.text: Down to the theatre, be swift, be saved.

45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Disgusted reaction to player's pretend illness.

34.speaker: Sister Sinda
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Disgusted reaction to player's pretend illness.

35.speaker: Sister Sinda
35.text: Plague! Pest! In line, or leave.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: Enough of this - I'm going in.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: Fine, fine. I'll get back in line.

68.speaker: Player
68.text: Wait! My wounds may not be visible on the outside, but I still need help.
68.context: InternalNodeContext: The receptionist recognises that you're referring to your mental health.

70.text: *There's a hint of recognition in her eyes as she studies you.*
70.context: InternalNodeContext: The receptionist recognises that you're referring to your mental health.

91.speaker: Narrator
91.text: *There's a hint of recognition in her eyes as she studies you.*
91.context: InternalNodeContext: The receptionist recognises that you're referring to your mental health.

29.speaker: Sister Sinda
29.text: The unseen wounds of war - the doctor's hand will close them.

50.speaker: Player
50.text: Every monster you can imagine, man or beast, has tried to kill me. I should really see the doctor.

75.speaker: Player
75.text: You can let me in or I can burn, electrify, or freeze this place - maybe even all three. Your choice.

76.speaker: Sister Sinda
76.text: A most impatient patient... Very well. Still your cries, restless soul.

90.speaker: Sister Sinda
90.text: A most impatient patient... Very well. Still your cries, restless soul.

46.text: Quiet! Quiet! Everyone must wait their turn, wait in line... Doctor's orders.

16.speaker: Sister Sinda
16.text: Quiet! Quiet! Everyone must wait their turn, wait in line... Doctor's orders.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: I've picked up a diabolic disease - the symptoms are quite hellish.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: My dear lady - look at my complexion. I am at death's door.
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: shocked reaction to Astarion's palenessNodeContext: shocked reaction -the patient is pale as a ghost

65.speaker: Sister Sinda
65.text: As pale as a ghost. You must see the doctor immediately.
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: shocked reaction to Astarion's palenessNodeContext: shocked reaction -the patient is pale as a ghost

12.speaker: Player
12.text: No thanks, I'll take my chances out there.

71.speaker: Sister Sinda
71.context: CinematicNodeContext: The nurse 'looks' you over, assessing your condition.
